table_description: A DigitalOcean image can be used to create a Droplet and may come in a number of flavors. Currently, there are five types of images: snapshots, backups, applications, distributions, and custom images.

columns.name: id
columns.description: A unique number that can be used to identify and reference a specific image.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The display name that has been given to an image. This is what is shown in the control panel and is generally a descriptive title for the image in question.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the image was created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: An optional free-form text field to describe an image.

columns.name: distribution
columns.description: This attribute describes the base distribution used for this image. For custom images, this is user defined.

columns.name: error_message
columns.description: A string containing information about errors that may occur when importing a custom image.

columns.name: min_disk_size
columns.description: The minimum disk size in GB required for a Droplet to use this image.

columns.name: public
columns.description: This is a boolean value that indicates whether the image in question is public or not. An image that is public is available to all accounts. A non-public image is only accessible from your account.

columns.name: regions
columns.description: Array of region slugs where the image is available.

columns.name: size_gigabytes
columns.description: The size of the image in gigabytes.

columns.name: slug
columns.description: A uniquely identifying string that is associated with each of the DigitalOcean-provided public images. These can be used to reference a public image as an alternative to the numeric id.

columns.name: status
columns.description: A status string indicating the state of a custom image. This may be \"NEW\", \"available\", \"pending\", or \"deleted\".

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: An array containing the names of the tags the image has been tagged with.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Describes the kind of image. It may be one of \"snapshot\", \"backup\", or \"custom\".

columns.name: urn
columns.description: The uniform resource name (URN) for the volume.
